headline: Teledyne’s New Generation Onboard Secure Data Loader eADL XS™ Certified on Boeing 737NG Aircraft
summary: EL SEGUNDO, Calif., November 15, 2024--Teledyne Controls, a subsidiary of Teledyne Technologies (NYSE:TDY) and a leading provider of innovative avionics and aircraft data management solutions, is pleased to announce that its new onboard enhanced Airborne Data Loader (eADL XS™) has received certification for use on the Boeing 737NG aircraft series. Certification for other aircraft platforms is in progress.
